price: ߊ߲ ߞߍߕߐ߫ ߡߌ߬ߘߊ߬ߟߌ ߞߍ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߡߌ߬ߘߊ߬ߟߌ߬ ߜߍߟߍ߲ ߠߊ߫ ߟߏ߲ ߡߍ߲ ، ߒ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߒ߬ ߕߊߢߐ߲߯ߓߐ߫ ߏ߬ ߘߐ߫
arabic: يَوۡمَ نَبۡطِشُ ٱلۡبَطۡشَةَ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰٓ إِنَّا مُنتَقِمُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: yawma nabṭishu al-baṭshata al-kub'rā innā muntaqimūna
